analyzed: mya ngan rab tu nyams bzhin ngo mtshar ldan par thal //

original: de nas yid mi bde bas yongs lding mig can ma //
analyzed: de nas yid mi bde bas yongs lding mig can ma //

original: phrug gu rab tu nyams pa'i 'ol ba sdug bsngal bzhin //
analyzed: phrug gu rab tu nyams pa'i 'ol ba sdug bsngal bzhin //

analyzed: rmongs gyur nyid kyang mchi ma dang ldan gdong gis smras //
translated: With a face full of tears, spoke in a confused way:

original: rlabs chen dang ldan 'jam zhing dkar min dge ba ste //
analyzed: rlabs chen dang ldan 'jam zhing dkar min dge ba ste //
translated: “The one with great waves, smooth, not dark, and virtuous,

analyzed: so so so sor rtsa ba nas 'khrungs gyen du 'khyil //

original: de yid bu skyes sa la 'thor ba de rnams ni //
analyzed: de yid bu skyes sa la 'thor ba de rnams ni //

analyzed: mi dbang dbu rgyan la ni yongs su dkri bar 'os //
translated: Are suitable for being completely wrapped around the crown of the head of a lord of men.

analyzed: phyag ni rab 'phyang ri dags rgyal po'i stobs mnga' zhing // khyu mchog chen po'i spyan ldan gser 'bar 'od mnga' ba //

analyzed: 'brug dang rnga yi sgra ldan sku stod rnam par yangs //
translated: Having the sound of thunder and a drum, with an expansive upper body,

original: de ltar gyur kyang dka' thub gnas su gnas par 'os //
analyzed: de ltar gyur kyang dka' thub gnas su gnas par 'os //
translated: Even though it is like that, it is suitable to remain in a place of austerities.🔽With well-grown fingers, smooth and connected by webs,

original: sor mo legs skyes 'jam zhing dra bas 'brel pa dang // long bu mi mngon padma'i @30b rtsa ba ltar 'jam la //
analyzed: sor mo legs skyes 'jam zhing dra bas 'brel pa dang // long bu mi mngon padma'i @30b rtsa ba ltar 'jam la //
translated: With ankles not protruding, smooth like the root of a lotus,

original: dbus na 'khor lo dang bcas zhabs ni de dag gis //
analyzed: dbus na 'khor lo dang bcas zhabs ni de dag gis //
translated: In the center, with a wheel, the foot is by those.🔽

analyzed: drang srong rnams kyi nags mtha'i sa la 'gro 'am ci //

analyzed: khang bzangs logs na khri dang gdan la 'os pa ste //
translated: You are worthy of a throne and couch in a palace,

original: rin chen na bza' lci min tsandan gyis spras shing //
analyzed: rin chen na bza' lci min tsandan gyis spras shing //
translated: not of a heavy jeweled garment and sandalwood in the forest.

original: de yi lus ni mdangs dang ldan pa nags dag tu //
analyzed: de yi lus ni mdangs dang ldan pa nags dag tu //

original: grang dang dro dang chu 'od rnams su bskor ram ci //
analyzed: grang dang dro dang chu 'od rnams su bskor ram ci //

analyzed: rigs dang gzugs dang stobs dang sems pa dag dang ni //

analyzed: thos dang phun sum tshogs dang na tshod kyis khengs shing //
translated: because of your learning, excellence, and youth.

analyzed: slong bar ma yin ster ba nyid du mngon 'ongs pa //

analyzed: de ni pha rol dag la slong mo rgyu 'am ci //

analyzed: gser khri dang zhing gzims mal dag la gzims nas ni //

original: mtshan mo sil snyan sgra rnams dag gis rab slong ba //
analyzed: mtshan mo sil snyan sgra rnams dag gis rab slong ba //

original: gos kyi phyogs gcig bar nas yi logs la ni //
analyzed: gos kyi phyogs gcig bar nas yi logs la ni //

original: bdag gi brtul zhugs ltan de de ring ji ltar gzims //
analyzed: bdag gi brtul zhugs ltan de de ring ji ltar gzims //

original: snying rje'i smre sngags rab tu zlos pa 'di thos nas //
analyzed: snying rje'i smre sngags rab tu zlos pa 'di thos nas //

original: bud med de rnams phan tshun lag pas yongs 'khyud de //
analyzed: bud med de rnams phan tshun lag pas yongs 'khyud de //
translated: Those women embraced each other with their arms

original: ljon shing g-yos las me tog las ni sbrang rtsi bzhin //
analyzed: ljon shing g-yos las me tog las ni sbrang rtsi bzhin //
translated: And like flowers from a shaken tree,

analyzed: rnam par lta byed dag nas chu dag 'thor ba'o //

original: de nas ngang pa med pa'i ngang mo bzhin du ni //
analyzed: de nas ngang pa med pa'i ngang mo bzhin du ni //

original: grags 'dzin ma ni nor 'dzin sa la 'gyel gyur la //
analyzed: grags 'dzin ma ni nor 'dzin sa la 'gyel gyur la //
translated: Yaśodharā fell to the ground, which holds wealth,

original: rnam par 'khrugs shing yang dang yang du ldab ldib kyi //
analyzed: rnam par 'khrugs shing yang dang yang du ldab ldib kyi //
translated: And in a state of confusion, she repeatedly said

original: skad kyis de dang de dag rnam par smras pa'o //
analyzed: skad kyis de dang de dag rnam par smras pa'o //

analyzed: chos dang lhan cig spyod pa mgon med kho mo ni //

analyzed: de yis dong nas gal te chos ni byed 'dod cing //
translated: If he has gone away, desiring to practice the Dharma,

analyzed: chos dang lhan cig spyod ma dang bral dka' thub gang //
translated: What Dharma is there for me, who is separated from my Dharma-practicing husband,

analyzed: yongs su longs spyod 'dod 'di'i chos ni ga la zhig //

original: sngon gyi sa skyong rnams des nges par ma mthong ste //
analyzed: sngon gyi sa skyong rnams des nges par ma mthong ste //

analyzed: legs mthong chen po la sogs mes po chen po rnams //

original: bdag po ldan ma dang bcas nags su gshegs gyur la //
analyzed: bdag po ldan ma dang bcas nags su gshegs gyur la //
translated: went to the forest with their wives,

original: kho mo dang bral chos byed 'dod pa de ltar ltos //
analyzed: kho mo dang bral chos byed 'dod pa de ltar ltos //

analyzed: mchod sbyin du 'am rig byed cho gas 'dus byas shing //

analyzed: pho mo gnyis la dbang bskur de yi 'bras bu ni //
translated: the consecration of a man and a woman as a couple

analyzed: gzhan du mnyam bor longs spyod 'dod pa ma mthong ste //
translated: I have never seen the desire to enjoy equally with another.

analyzed: 'jigs med lha mo las ni dga' ba len par 'dod // de la lus kyi yon tan bzung ba'i @31a * //

original: btsun mo de //
analyzed: btsun mo de //

original: ci 'dra zhig gam 'di ni bdag gis bsam mno ste //
analyzed: ci 'dra zhig gam 'di ni bdag gis bsam mno ste //

original: bdag gi gus pa nyid dang bud med bor nas ni //
analyzed: bdag gi gus pa nyid dang bud med bor nas ni //

analyzed: nags su gang phyir des ni dka' thub rnams la gdung //

analyzed: gtsang zhing bzhad pa gyen du blta ba'i skal med na //

analyzed: skal ba dman par 'os min sgra gcan 'dzin de yang //

analyzed: pha yi pang na yongs su gnas par nam zhig 'gyur //

analyzed: yid ni mi rnams kyis bsngags shin tu sra ba ste //

analyzed: ngag gi skad grag rab zos dgra yang dga' ba yi //

analyzed: bu ni byis pa 'di 'dra kye ma spong bar byed //

original: bdag gi 'dod pa'i sems kyang shin tu sra ba ste //
analyzed: bdag gi 'dod pa'i sems kyang shin tu sra ba ste //

analyzed: rdo las gyur ram yang na lcags las byas pa'am //

analyzed: bder 'os jo bo dbal dor nags su song ba la //

original: mgon med ldan pa gad zhig dum bur ma song ngo //
analyzed: mgon med ldan pa gad zhig dum bur ma song ngo //

analyzed: de lhar lha mo bdag bo'i mya ngan gyis brgyal te /

analyzed: sems shing rnam zlos lan cig ma yin 'di dus la //
translated: She is thinking, and repeating to herself, not for the first time, at this time:

analyzed: rang bzhin brtan yang dam ba mo de mya ngan gyis //

analyzed: brtan pa dran pa ma yin ngo tsham byas so // de nas de ltar mya ngan gyis smra rnam 'khrugs pa'i //

original: grags 'dzin ma ni sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas ni //
analyzed: grags 'dzin ma ni sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas ni //
translated: With tearful faces, the women cried out

original: char gyis btang bas padma chen po bzhin du ni //🔽mchi bcas gdong gis bud med rnams ni cho nges 'debs //
analyzed: char gyis btang bas padma chen po bzhin du ni // mchi bcas gdong gis bud med rnams ni cho nges 'debs //

analyzed: bzlas brjod rdzogs shing sbyin sreg bkra shis byas gyur te //
translated: “The recitation was completed, the fire sacrifice and the benediction were performed,

analyzed: mi skyong nyid kyang lta gang dag nas phyir gshegs pa //
translated: The king himself, having seen the path by which he had gone forth,

analyzed: rdo rje'i sgra yis glang po ji bzhin skye ba yi //
translated: And having heard the sound of the elephant, like the sound of thunder,

analyzed: nyam thag sgra des kun nas bcom zhing g-yos par gyur //

analyzed: 'dun pa dang ni bsngags ldan gnyis po mthong nas kyang //
translated: And having seen both Chanda and Kaṇṭhaka,

analyzed: sras kyi nges par brten pa yang dag gsan nas ni //
translated: And having heard the report of his son’s resolve,

original: bde sogs bdag po'i ltad mo zin pa'i rgyal mtshan bzhin //
analyzed: bde sogs bdag po'i ltad mo zin pa'i rgyal mtshan bzhin //
translated: The king, like a banner of Indra, the lord of the gods, at the end of a festival,

analyzed: mya ngan gyis bcom sa yi bdag po 'gyel bar gyur //

analyzed: de nas sras po'i mya ngan gyis rmongs yud tsam zhig //
translated: Then, for a moment, he was confused by sorrow for his son,

analyzed: skye bo mtshungs mnyam mngon pa'i skye bos bzung gyur la //
translated: And was held up by the people who were equal to him in birth.

analyzed: chab kyis gang ba'i spyan gyis mgyogs @31b bgro la gzigs nas //
translated: With eyes filled with tears, he looked quickly at the road

analyzed: sa yi logs nas sa skyong gis ni sme sngags bton //

original: g-yul 'gyed pa na dga' chen mang po byas nas ni //
analyzed: g-yul 'gyed pa na dga' chen mang po byas nas ni //
translated: “Having performed many great deeds in battle,

analyzed: bsngags ldan khyod kyis bdag gi dga' ba ma yin byas //

analyzed: bdag gi dga' ba yon tan dga' de gang gis ni //

original: dga' ba yin yang dga' ba med bzhin nags su bor //
analyzed: dga' ba yin yang dga' ba med bzhin nags su bor //
translated: And though it is pleasing, I have been abandoned in the forest as if it were not.

original: de phyir de nyid gang du gshegs pa der bdag khyer //
analyzed: de phyir de nyid gang du gshegs pa der bdag khyer //

analyzed: yang na de ni slar yang skyen bar khyer la shog / tshabs cher na ba'i sman dang bral bas de bzhin du //

analyzed: de dang bral bas bdag gi 'tsho ba med pa'o //

original: rgyal bu gser 'bab 'chi bas phrogs par gyur pa na //
analyzed: rgyal bu gser 'bab 'chi bas phrogs par gyur pa na //

original: dka' thub gang las yang dag rgyal ba shi ma gyur //
analyzed: dka' thub gang las yang dag rgyal ba shi ma gyur //

original: bdag kyang chos 'dzin sras po gshegs par gyur pa na //
analyzed: bdag kyang chos 'dzin sras po gshegs par gyur pa na //
translated: When I, the son who upholds the Dharma, have departed,

original: bdag nyid thar 'dod bdag nyid med pa lta bur gyur //
analyzed: bdag nyid thar 'dod bdag nyid med pa lta bur gyur //
translated: I will be like one without a self, desiring liberation.

original: rgyal rigs bcu byas khyab bdag skye dgu'i bdag po ni //
analyzed: rgyal rigs bcu byas khyab bdag skye dgu'i bdag po ni //
translated: The lord of the people, the sun's son, the supreme one,

original: mchog dang mchog min shes pa nyi ma'i sras po yi //
analyzed: mchog dang mchog min shes pa nyi ma'i sras po yi //
translated: Knows what is supreme and what is not.

original: bu ni phangs shing sdug bsngal dam pa dang bral la //
analyzed: bu ni phangs shing sdug bsngal dam pa dang bral la //
translated: The son is dear, and he is freed from the highest suffering.

original: yid mi bde byas yid kyi rmongs pa gang las min //
analyzed: yid mi bde byas yid kyi rmongs pa gang las min //

original: rgyal bo aa dza'i sras po blo dang ldan pa ni //
analyzed: rgyal bo aa dza'i sras po blo dang ldan pa ni //

original: mi bdag dbang po'i grogs la bdag gi 'dod pa ste //
analyzed: mi bdag dbang po'i grogs la bdag gi 'dod pa ste //
translated: is my desire for the friend of the lord of men.

original: sras po nags su song la gang zhig lhar song la //
analyzed: sras po nags su song la gang zhig lhar song la //
translated: The son has gone to the forest, and I, having gone to the gods,

analyzed: mchi ma don yod ma yin bkren pas 'chos so kye // khyod kyang bdag gi chu yi snyim pa de gang du //

original: phrogs pa'i dka' thub gnas der bzang po bdag la smros //
analyzed: phrogs pa'i dka' thub gnas der bzang po bdag la smros //
translated: Tell me, good one.

original: de la bdag gi skom pa 'dis ni yongs 'dod de //
analyzed: de la bdag gi skom pa 'dis ni yongs 'dod de //
translated: For this thirst of mine is completely satisfied by you,

original: bdag gi srog ni yi dags 'gro bar 'dod //
analyzed: bdag gi srog ni yi dags 'gro bar 'dod //
translated: and my life desires to go to the realm of the hungry ghosts.

original: de ltar sras dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal skyes gyur te //
analyzed: de ltar sras dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal skyes gyur te //
translated: Thus, having given rise to the suffering of separation from my son,

original: sa dang 'dra ba'i lhan skyes brtan pa rnam spangs nas //
analyzed: sa dang 'dra ba'i lhan skyes brtan pa rnam spangs nas //
translated: having abandoned the innate stability that is like the earth,

original: r'a ma'i mya ngan dag gis shing rta bcu pa bzhin //
analyzed: r'a ma'i mya ngan dag gis shing rta bcu pa bzhin //
translated: like the ten chariots of Rāma's grief,

analyzed: mi skyong 'du shes bral bzhin mang po rnam par la bas // de nas de la thos dang dul dang yon tan ldan //
translated: And many kings, devoid of discrimination, have perished.🔽Then, the aged minister, learned, disciplined, and virtuous,

original: rab bgres mdun na 'don dang blon po blo gros kyis //
analyzed: rab bgres mdun na 'don dang blon po blo gros kyis //
translated: The chief minister, wise,

original: mnyam par gzhag 'di ji lta ba bzhin smas gyur te //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag 'di ji lta ba bzhin smas gyur te //

analyzed: rgyun mi 'chad par nyam thag snying rjer du ba mo //

original: drang srong ri byi bsnyen zhing phyogs su ma song ba //
analyzed: drang srong ri byi bsnyen zhing phyogs su ma song ba //

original: yang dag skyed bar byed ba'i lha mo mkhyen par mdzod //
analyzed: yang dag skyed bar byed ba'i lha mo mkhyen par mdzod //
translated: The goddess who truly gives birth, please understand.

analyzed: ngang pa rnam par bral ba'i ngang mo lta bu dang // nags na glang po dang bral glang mo lta bu ni //

analyzed: mgon dang bcas kyang mgon med dman zhing nyam thag pa'o //
translated: Though they have a protector, they are without a protector, wretched and miserable.

original: btsun mo gzigs pa yis ni skyob par 'os pa yin //
analyzed: btsun mo gzigs pa yis ni skyob par 'os pa yin //

original: sras gcig byis pa sdug bsngal 'os pa ma yin pa //
analyzed: sras gcig byis pa sdug bsngal 'os pa ma yin pa //
translated: The only son, a child, does not deserve suffering.

original: kun nas gdung ba mthar gyur pa ni 'dren pa ste //
analyzed: kun nas gdung ba mthar gyur pa ni 'dren pa ste //
translated: The end of the burning is the guide.

original: gang ba'i zla ba sgra gcan nye bar bsgyur las bzhin //
analyzed: gang ba'i zla ba sgra gcan nye bar bsgyur las bzhin //
translated: Like the full moon freed from Rāhu,

analyzed: sgra gcan 'dzin de gnyen gyi mya ngan las thar mdzod //

original: pho brang btsun mo'i 'khor dang grong khyer mtha' dag ni //
analyzed: pho brang btsun mo'i 'khor dang grong khyer mtha' dag ni //
translated: The palace, the harem, and the whole city

analyzed: khyed dang bral ba'i bud shing can gyi mya ngan me // phyir 'byung dbugs ni du ba mun pa'i rtse mo yis //
translated: are a fire of grief fed by the fuel of separation from you.🔽The smoke of the breath of those who have lost their minds

original: tshig pa dag ni khyed la lta ba'i chu 'dod do //
analyzed: tshig pa dag ni khyed la lta ba'i chu 'dod do //
translated: is the top of the darkness. They are burned and desire the water of seeing you.

original: mdun na 'don pa de yi tshig dag gsan gyur nas //
analyzed: mdun na 'don pa de yi tshig dag gsan gyur nas //
translated: Having heard those words of the family priest,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yongs su gang ba'i sems dpa' des //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yongs su gang ba'i sems dpa' des //
translated: The Bodhisattva, filled with compassion,

analyzed: yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes pas yud tsam zhig / bsam gtan mdzad nas rigs pa'i lan 'di smras pa'o //
translated: having reflected for a moment, gave this reasonable answer:

analyzed: pa rnams kyi ni bu la dgongs pa shes pa ste // gang zhig bdag las skyong gi ni khyad par du //

original: shes pa yin yang na dang rga dang rgud pa las //
analyzed: shes pa yin yang na dang rga dang rgud pa las //

original: 'jigs te nags su phyin nas rang gi skye bo dor //
analyzed: 'jigs te nags su phyin nas rang gi skye bo dor //

original: mthar ni gal te dga' ba dang bral ma yin na //
analyzed: mthar ni gal te dga' ba dang bral ma yin na //
translated: If in the end I am not separated from my beloved,

original: rang gi skye bo dga' ba lta 'dod cis ma yin ;
analyzed: rang gi skye bo dga' ba lta 'dod cis ma yin ;

original: / gang tshe yun ring gyur kyang rnam par 'bral ba ste //
analyzed: / gang tshe yun ring gyur kyang rnam par 'bral ba ste //
translated: When, after a long time, there is separation,

analyzed: de phyir bla ma brtse ba yin yang 'dor bar bgyi // gang yang bdag gi ched du mi yi bdag po yi //
translated: then, although the guru is kind, he must be left behind.🔽 The words of grief that you have spoken for my sake,

original: mya ngan khyod kyis smras des bdag la dga' ba med //
analyzed: mya ngan khyod kyis smras des bdag la dga' ba med //
translated: O lord of men, do not please me at all.🔽 For, in dreams, I have seen my relatives,

original: gang phyir rmi lam yang dag 'dus par gyur rnams su //
analyzed: gang phyir rmi lam yang dag 'dus par gyur rnams su //
translated: and they have been reunited with me.

original: rnam par 'dral @34a * //
analyzed: rnam par 'dral @34a * //
translated: It is torn apart,

original: bar 'gyur la kun nas gdung bar byed //
analyzed: bar 'gyur la kun nas gdung bar byed //
translated: and is tormented.

original: 'gro ba'i spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong nas ni //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong nas ni //
translated: Having seen the various activities of beings,

original: de bzhin du yang khyod kyi blo gros nges par song //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang khyod kyi blo gros nges par song //
translated: in the same way, your mind should be certain.

original: bu min gnyen min kun nas gdung ba'i rgyu yin bzhin //
analyzed: bu min gnyen min kun nas gdung ba'i rgyu yin bzhin //
translated: Not a son, not a relative, it is the cause of torment.

original: 'ching ba de ni shes pa med pa'i mtshan ma nyid //
analyzed: 'ching ba de ni shes pa med pa'i mtshan ma nyid //
translated: That fetter is the sign of ignorance itself.

original: lam du 'gro rnams 'dir ni 'dus pa ji lta ba'i //
analyzed: lam du 'gro rnams 'dir ni 'dus pa ji lta ba'i //
translated: Just as those who travel on a road gather here,

original: skye dgu rnams ni dus su nges par 'bral ba ste //
analyzed: skye dgu rnams ni dus su nges par 'bral ba ste //
translated: so too are beings certain to part at the right time.

original: gnyen 'dun dam 'cha' skye bos rnam par dman pa yi //
analyzed: gnyen 'dun dam 'cha' skye bos rnam par dman pa yi //
translated: With relatives and friends, one is inferior due to birth.

original: shes rab ldan pa'i skye bos mya ngan bsnyen nam ci //
analyzed: shes rab ldan pa'i skye bos mya ngan bsnyen nam ci //

original: gzhan du rang gi skye bo dor nas 'dir 'ongs la //
analyzed: gzhan du rang gi skye bo dor nas 'dir 'ongs la //
translated: Having abandoned one's own people elsewhere and come here,

original: 'dir yang rab tu bslus nas slar yang 'gro ba ste //
analyzed: 'dir yang rab tu bslus nas slar yang 'gro ba ste //

original: der song nas kyang pha rol gzhan du 'gro 'gyur la //
analyzed: der song nas kyang pha rol gzhan du 'gro 'gyur la //
translated: Having gone there, one goes to another place.

original: de ltar 'dor ldan skyo la rjes su brten nam ci //
analyzed: de ltar 'dor ldan skyo la rjes su brten nam ci //

original: gang tshe mngal nas bzung ste gnas skabs thams cad du //
analyzed: gang tshe mngal nas bzung ste gnas skabs thams cad du //
translated: From the moment of conception, in every stage of life,

original: gsod pa'i phyir ni 'chi ba rab tu gnas pa ste //
analyzed: gsod pa'i phyir ni 'chi ba rab tu gnas pa ste //
translated: Death is present, ready to strike.

original: bu la dga' ba der ni khyed kyis smras pa yi //
analyzed: bu la dga' ba der ni khyed kyis smras pa yi //
translated: You say that the love of a son is the only thing

original: bdag gi nags su brten pa gang phyir dus ma yin //
analyzed: bdag gi nags su brten pa gang phyir dus ma yin //

original: yul la mngon par lhung tshe dus ma yin pa de //
analyzed: yul la mngon par lhung tshe dus ma yin pa de //

original: de bzhin nor gyi cho gar zhugs pa dus yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin nor gyi cho gar zhugs pa dus yin no //
translated: The right time is when one is engaged in the rites of wealth.

original: dus rnams kun du dus kyi 'gro ba khyab pa ste //
analyzed: dus rnams kun du dus kyi 'gro ba khyab pa ste //
translated: The time for going forth is always the right time;

original: dge legs nges par thob pa dus yod ma yin no //
analyzed: dge legs nges par thob pa dus yod ma yin no //
translated: The time for attaining the highest good is never the right time.

original: gang yang rgyal pos bdag la rgyal srid 'dir bzhad la //
analyzed: gang yang rgyal pos bdag la rgyal srid 'dir bzhad la //
translated: As for the king’s offer of the kingdom,

analyzed: de yang yab kyi rgya chen mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste // sred pa las ni nad pa'i mi 'phrod zas bzhin du //

original: bdag gis rab tu 'dzin par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag gis rab tu 'dzin par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: I cannot accept it, any more than I could accept🔽Food that is not suitable for a sick man.

original: gti mug rmongs pa'i gzhi ma mi skyong rgyal po nyid //
analyzed: gti mug rmongs pa'i gzhi ma mi skyong rgyal po nyid //
translated: Kingship is the basis for delusion and confusion;

original: rab tu 'thob par mi ni mkhas pas gang phyir nus //
analyzed: rab tu 'thob par mi ni mkhas pas gang phyir nus //
translated: How can a wise man aspire to it?

original: gang du skyo ba dang bcas rgyags dang ngal dub dang // pha rol log par spyod pas ches la gnod pa'o //
analyzed: gang du skyo ba dang bcas rgyags dang ngal dub dang // pha rol log par spyod pas ches la gnod pa'o //
translated: Where there is weariness, arrogance, and fatigue, and where the wrong conduct of others causes great harm.

original: 'dzam bu chu gser bzhin du gsal ba'i lding khang ni //
analyzed: 'dzam bu chu gser bzhin du gsal ba'i lding khang ni //
translated: A palace that is as bright as the gold of the Jambu River

original: dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang po lta bu dang // gza' yis 'khrugs pa'i padma dang bcas chu lta bu //
analyzed: dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang po lta bu dang // gza' yis 'khrugs pa'i padma dang bcas chu lta bu //
translated: Is like delicious food mixed with poison, or like water with a lotus that is disturbed by a planet.

original: rgyal srid dang ni gser dag sdug bsngal dag gi rten ;
analyzed: rgyal srid dang ni gser dag sdug bsngal dag gi rten ;
translated: Kingship and gold are the basis of suffering.

original: / de ltar rgyal srid chos min bde ba ma yin pa //
analyzed: / de ltar rgyal srid chos min bde ba ma yin pa //
translated: Thus, kingship is not a source of happiness, if it is not in accord with the Dharma.

original: ji ltar mi gtsang skyes te mi dbang snga ma rnams //
analyzed: ji ltar mi gtsang skyes te mi dbang snga ma rnams //
translated: Just as the previous lords of the people, born from impurities,

original: sdug bsngal yongs su spang bya na tshod rab mchog tshe //
analyzed: sdug bsngal yongs su spang bya na tshod rab mchog tshe //

original: rgyal srid nges par dor nas nags su song bar gyur //
analyzed: rgyal srid nges par dor nas nags su song bar gyur //
translated: Definitely gave up their kingdoms and went to the forest.

original: rin chen bzhin du tshim ba mchog ni nyer mkhyud nas //
analyzed: rin chen bzhin du tshim ba mchog ni nyer mkhyud nas //
translated: Having taken up the supreme satisfaction, like a jewel,

original: 'brog @34b dgon dag na rtsva dag zos pa mchog yin la //
analyzed: 'brog @34b dgon dag na rtsva dag zos pa mchog yin la //
translated: The supreme thing to eat in the wilderness is grass.

original: sbrul nag bzhin du mthong ba ma yin nyes pa ni //
analyzed: sbrul nag bzhin du mthong ba ma yin nyes pa ni //
translated: The fault of not being seen is like a black snake.

original: rnyed bla'i dpal dang lhan cig nyal ba mchog ma yin //
analyzed: rnyed bla'i dpal dang lhan cig nyal ba mchog ma yin //
translated: To sleep with the glory of wealth is not the best.

original: rgyal srid rnam par spangs pa rgyal po rnams kyi chos //
analyzed: rgyal srid rnam par spangs pa rgyal po rnams kyi chos //
translated: The dharma of kings is to abandon kingdoms.

original: mngon par 'dod pas nags su rab 'jug bsngags pa ste //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pas nags su rab 'jug bsngags pa ste //
translated: It is praised to enter the forest out of desire.

original: nags tshal yongs su dor nas khyim du rab 'jug pa //
analyzed: nags tshal yongs su dor nas khyim du rab 'jug pa //
translated: To abandon the forest and enter the home

original: dam bca' nye bar bcom pa'i 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dam bca' nye bar bcom pa'i 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: is not reasonable when one's vow has been destroyed.

original: rigs su skyes shing sems pa dang bcas mi gang gis //
analyzed: rigs su skyes shing sems pa dang bcas mi gang gis //

original: chos ni mngon par 'dod pas nags su rab zhugs la //
analyzed: chos ni mngon par 'dod pas nags su rab zhugs la //

analyzed: ngur smrig rab tu dor nas ngo tsha rnam spangs nas //

original: grong khyer 'joms pa yi yang grong la bsnyen ma yin //
analyzed: grong khyer 'joms pa yi yang grong la bsnyen ma yin //
translated: One who has destroyed a town should not approach another town.

original: sred dang rnam par rmongs dang yang na 'jigs pa yis //
analyzed: sred dang rnam par rmongs dang yang na 'jigs pa yis //
translated: Out of craving, confusion, or fear,

original: gang zhig skyugs pa'i bza' ba slar yang len byed la //
analyzed: gang zhig skyugs pa'i bza' ba slar yang len byed la //
translated: one who has vomited food takes it again.

original: sred pa de ni rmongs dang yang na 'jigs pa yis //
analyzed: sred pa de ni rmongs dang yang na 'jigs pa yis //

original: 'dod pa rnams ni dor nas slar yang len par byed //
analyzed: 'dod pa rnams ni dor nas slar yang len par byed //
translated: abandons desires and takes them up again.

original: gang zhig rab 'bar khang pa dag nas ci zhig ltar ;
analyzed: gang zhig rab 'bar khang pa dag nas ci zhig ltar ;

original: / byung nas slar yang de nyid kho nar rab 'jug la //
analyzed: / byung nas slar yang de nyid kho nar rab 'jug la //

original: nyes pa mthong de khyim na gnas pa dor nas ni //
analyzed: nyes pa mthong de khyim na gnas pa dor nas ni //
translated: Having seen the faults of living in a house,

original: rmongs pas slar yang len par mngon par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: rmongs pas slar yang len par mngon par 'dod pa'o //
translated: the wise renounce it and have no desire to return.

original: gang yang mi skyong khyim na gnas pas thar pa ni //
analyzed: gang yang mi skyong khyim na gnas pas thar pa ni //

original: 'thob pa dang ldan zhes thos de ni med pa ste //
analyzed: 'thob pa dang ldan zhes thos de ni med pa ste //

original: zhi ba gtso bo'i thar pa'i chos ni gang la yang //
analyzed: zhi ba gtso bo'i thar pa'i chos ni gang la yang //

analyzed: chad pa gtso bo'i rgyal po'i chos ni gang du'o //

analyzed: zhi ba dga' ba gal te rgyal srid dman pa ste //

analyzed: rgyal srid la blo gal te zhi ba rnam par nyams //

original: grang dang dro dang me dang chu yi gcig nyid bzhin //
analyzed: grang dang dro dang me dang chu yi gcig nyid bzhin //

original: zhi ba dang ni rno nyid 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: zhi ba dang ni rno nyid 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: so peace and sharpness are not tenable.

original: me dang chu yi 'du ba yod pa ma yin la //
analyzed: me dang chu yi 'du ba yod pa ma yin la //

original: khram dang drang po'i 'du ba yod pa ma yin zhing //
analyzed: khram dang drang po'i 'du ba yod pa ma yin zhing //
translated: no union of deceit and honesty,

analyzed: 'phags dang sdig pa'i 'du ba yod pa ma yin te //

original: zhi dang chad pa'i 'du ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: zhi dang chad pa'i 'du ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: no gathering of the peaceful and the violent.

analyzed: de phyir sa 'dzin bdag po de rnams nges pas sam //
translated: Therefore, those lords of the earth, with certainty,

analyzed: rgyal po'i srid rnams spangs te zhi ba thob pa can //
translated: renounced their kingdoms and attained peace.

original: rgyal srid dag la bsnyen nam dbang po sbas nyid las //
analyzed: rgyal srid dag la bsnyen nam dbang po sbas nyid las //
translated: “ ‘Is it because of the kingdom that they approached, or because of the seclusion of the senses,

analyzed: mthar ma thug par thar par mngon pa'i nga rgyal byas //
translated: that they have made the claim to liberation without reaching the end?

original: de dag rnams kyi rgyal srid la zhi ji lta bzhin //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi rgyal srid la zhi ji lta bzhin //
translated: How is it that they have peace in their kingdoms?

original: bdag ni nags tshal rab thob nges pas ma yin zhing //
analyzed: bdag ni nags tshal rab thob nges pas ma yin zhing //
translated: I have not attained the forest with certainty,

original: khyim dang gnyen gyi 'du shes zhags pa bcad nas ni //
analyzed: khyim dang gnyen gyi 'du shes zhags pa bcad nas ni //
translated: but having cut the noose of the perception of home and relatives,

original: thar gyur slar yang rab tu 'jug par 'dod ma yin //
analyzed: thar gyur slar yang rab tu 'jug par 'dod ma yin //
translated: I will not return to the world once I am liberated.’

original: de ltar bdag @35a * //
analyzed: de ltar bdag @35a * //
translated: “In this way,

original: nyid rnam shes yon tan rjes mthun pa //
analyzed: nyid rnam shes yon tan rjes mthun pa //
translated: with a mind that is in accord with the qualities of consciousness,

original: re 'dod spangs shing gtan tshigs ldan pa sgrogs pa ste //
analyzed: re 'dod spangs shing gtan tshigs ldan pa sgrogs pa ste //
translated: he proclaims with certainty and reason,

original: mi dbang bdag nyid skyes kyi smra ldan thos gyur nas //
analyzed: mi dbang bdag nyid skyes kyi smra ldan thos gyur nas //
translated: ‘I am the son of the king of men, the one who speaks and is heard.’

original: gsang sngags 'dzin pa yis kyang lan ni smras pa'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags 'dzin pa yis kyang lan ni smras pa'o //
translated: The holder of the secret replied:

analyzed: gang zhig chos kyi cho gar nges pa khyod kyi 'di//
translated: “This of yours, which is certain to be the rite of Dharma,

original: rig pa min pa ma yin 'di ni dus rig min //
analyzed: rig pa min pa ma yin 'di ni dus rig min //
translated: is not without knowledge, but it is not the knowledge of time.

original: na tshod la gnas yab ma mya ngan phyir byin nas //
analyzed: na tshod la gnas yab ma mya ngan phyir byin nas //
translated: Having given to your father, who is in the prime of life, for the sake of grief,

analyzed: chos 'dod khyod kyi chos ma yin par gyur pa'o //
translated: it has become non-Dharma for you, who desire Dharma.

original: nges par khyed kyi blo yang shin tu phra min pa //
analyzed: nges par khyed kyi blo yang shin tu phra min pa //
translated: Certainly your mind is not very subtle,

original: yang na chos dang don dang 'dod par mkhas ma min //
analyzed: yang na chos dang don dang 'dod par mkhas ma min //
translated: or you are not skilled in Dharma, meaning, and desire.

original: gang zhig ma mthong 'bras bu'i don du khyed nyid kyis ;
analyzed: gang zhig ma mthong 'bras bu'i don du khyed nyid kyis ;
translated: For the sake of a fruit that is not seen, you yourself

original: / mngon sum don ni yongs su brnyas par mdzad nas gshegs //🔽yang srid yod ces kha cig dag ni smra ba ste //
analyzed: / mngon sum don ni yongs su brnyas par mdzad nas gshegs // yang srid yod ces kha cig dag ni smra ba ste //
translated: have gone, having completely disregarded the manifest meaning.🔽Some say there is existence after death,

original: med ces kha cig dag ni nges par dam 'cha'o //
analyzed: med ces kha cig dag ni nges par dam 'cha'o //
translated: while some are certain in their vow of non-existence.

original: de ltar gang tshe don 'di the tshom gyur pa ste //
analyzed: de ltar gang tshe don 'di the tshom gyur pa ste //
translated: Thus, when this meaning is in doubt,

original: de phyir longs spyod par nus dpal ni nye bar gnas //
analyzed: de phyir longs spyod par nus dpal ni nye bar gnas //
translated: therefore, the glory of being able to enjoy is present.

original: gal te slar yang rab tu 'jug pa gang yang yod //
analyzed: gal te slar yang rab tu 'jug pa gang yang yod //
translated: If there is some other engagement,

analyzed: der ni ji ltar 'bad pa dag la dga' bar bgyi //

original: ci ste gzhan du rab tu 'jug pa gang yang med //
analyzed: ci ste gzhan du rab tu 'jug pa gang yang med //

analyzed: rgyal po'i drang srong rnams kyang rigs su skyes pa yis //
